item.title: Critique Wheel
item.description: Critique Wheel The Critique Wheel is a free critique exchange for fiction writers. It was born out of seven years experience exchanging critiques and the need to share the benefits of our writing group’s critique group. The ‘wheel’ is an on-going project and I’m improving it as I learn the skills required. One of the best ways to improve is to get and give critique. If you’re a writer of short fiction and you want to improve, the ‘wheel’ is a great place to start.
